intro: Psychotria palawanensis, commonly known as the Palawan Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves with a smooth texture. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in lowland and montane forests. Psychotria palawanensis is noted for its ecological importance in supporting local biodiversity.
